title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server to pull, run, and manage large language models locally (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc.) with a built-in model library and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same generate/chat/embed API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama models for LLM, chat, and embeddings components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama WebUI) to chat with local models, upload docs/RAG, manage prompts, and multi-user auth.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; offers synchronous & async APIs, streaming, and Kotlin coroutines.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; generate, chat, and pull models from Ruby scripts or Rails apps.

title: ollama-cli (deno)
summary: A Deno-based CLI wrapper around Ollama with extra utilities like chat templates and prompt chaining.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that pipes GitHub Copilot prompts to a local Ollama model for private code completions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight RAG example using Ollama + Sentence-Transformers + Chroma to chat with local PDFs.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that answers questions using any Ollama model; supports slash commands and thread chats.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings Ollama models into Slack channels with streaming replies and mention triggers.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selectors and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) and Docker Compose examples for running Ollama in containers.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix derivation that builds Ollama from source with CUDA or ROCm acceleration for NixOS users.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing async/await bindings to Ollama’s REST API with Serde models.

title: ollama-dotnet
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama; supports chat, generate, embeddings, and model management in C# and F#.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Streamlit chatbot template that combines Ollama with LangChain and Chroma for private RAG deployments.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Community-curated collection of custom Modelfiles and quantization recipes for niche models.
